links.*: The Lord of the Rings (1955 radio series)

wikitext.*:
'''Valentine Dyall''' ([[7 May|May 7]], [[1908]] – [[24 June|June 24]], [[1985]]) was an English actor. Because of his sonorous voice, he often lent his voice to [[BBC]] radio plays. In the [[The Lord of the Rings (1955 radio series)|first radio series of ''The Lord of the Rings]]'', he played [[Théoden]] and [[Treebeard]].
